item.title: Can Apple’s iPhone 17 and AI Push Its Stock to New Highs?
item.description: Apple’s iPhone 17 and new AI features may drive a product revenue rebound. Could they help Apple stock surpass its all-time highs?

item.description: DoorDash is stepping into new frontiers, buying the British Deliveroo to bolster its ambitions abroad. The deal could add upside to shares long-term.
